But it was <S%H7969>so<s%>, that in the three and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3060>Jehoash<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> had not <S%H2388>repaired<s%> the <S%H919>breaches<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H225>consented<s%> that they should <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H1115>no<s%> more <S%H3701>money<s%> from the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H1115>neither<s%> <S%H2388>repair<s%> the <S%H919>breaches<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>.

But <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H727>chest<s%>, and <S%H5344>bored<s%> a <S%H2356>hole<s%> in the <S%H1817>lid<s%> of <S%H5414>it<s%>, and set it <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, on the right <S%H3225>side<s%> as <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H5592>threshold<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> therein all the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H935>brought<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And it was <S%H7200>so<s%>, when they saw that there was <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> in the <S%H727>chest<s%>, that the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H5608>scribe<s%> and the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%>, and they put up in <S%H6696>bags<s%> and <S%H4487>counted<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And they <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H8505>weighed<s%> out into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of them that <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%>, that had the <S%H6485>oversight<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: and they paid it <S%H3318>out<s%> to the <S%H2796>carpenters<s%> and the <S%H1129>builders<s%>, that <S%H6213>wrought<s%> upon the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>,

and to the <S%H1443>masons<s%> and the <S%H2672>hewers<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%>, and for <S%H7069>buying<s%> <S%H6086>timber<s%> and <S%H4274>hewn<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> to <S%H2388>repair<s%> the <S%H919>breaches<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and for all that was laid <S%H3318>out<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> to repair <S%H2394>it<s%>.

But there were not <S%H6213>made<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5592>cups<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, <S%H4212>snuffers<s%>, <S%H4219>basins<s%>, <S%H2689>trumpets<s%>, any <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, or <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, of the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H935>brought<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>;
for they <S%H5414>gave<s%> that to them that did the <S%H4399>work<s%>, and <S%H2388>repaired<s%> therewith the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Moreover they <S%H2803>reckoned<s%> not with the <S%H582>men<s%>, into whose <S%H3027>hand<s%> they <S%H5414>delivered<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> to them that did the <S%H4399>work<s%>; for they <S%H6213>dealt<s%> <S%H530>faithfully<s%>.

The <S%H3701>money<s%> for the <S%H817>trespass-offerings<s%>, and the <S%H3701>money<s%> for the <S%H2403>sin-offerings<s%>, was not <S%H935>brought<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: it was the <S%H3548>priests<s%>'.
